msbt.message: Oh man, I tried on the outfit you sent! I look real handsome! I'm gonna strut around the island and do stuff handsome dudes do.
I love the outfit ya sent me the other day! I loved it SO much, I bought more! Now I can wear that outfit every day without worrying about stains!
The outfit you gave me fits PERFECTLY! Did you take my measurements when I wasn't looking?! In case it was just a lucky guess, I'm a size RCD (Real Cool Dude).
I tried to decorate my place with the furniture you sent, but I gotta do some cleaning first! Don't worry, man. I'll get to it real soon. Probably. I'll keep it safe till then!
Thanks for the furniture! I've been thinking about where to put it, but... I can't decide, man! It could go ANYWHERE! I gotta figure this out.
I was so surprised when I opened your package! New furniture! How the heck did it fit into that package?!
Did you know that I already have a furniture like you sent me? Now I've got two! My house is in stereo, man!
Thanks for the gift! It looks so yummy... I might... OK! I just ate it! It WAS real yummy! Thanks! Here's a thank-you gift. I hope you like it!
The flower stuff you sent blew all over when I sneezed! But I picked 'em all up, and I'll keep 'em in my pocket until they sprout!
I'm gonna plant the sapling you sent me in the best spot on the island! I've walked around all day, looking for that perfect spot! But I keep getting lost! Send help!
I never expected money! And that's good, man, because I bet YOU never expected a present from ME!
I've listened to the music you sent so many times, I've memorized it! It goes... doot doot, *record scratch*, doot doot, "word I'm not allowed to say," doot doot!
I went for a walk with the tool you sent me! Everyone was staring. I dunno why. I had it on a leash and everything!
Fossils are neat! If you sleep with one under your pillow, you'll see dinosaurs in your dreams!
A fossil that hasn't been checked! Oh man, should I enjoy the mystery, or ask Blathers to look at it? What if it's a lame fossil?! WHAT IF IT'S COOL?!
I hung the thing you sent me on my wall, and it looks great! It's like it's been there this whole time!
Thanks for the present! It was fun to get a present, so I'm sending you one too! Presents for everybody!
